reviews.review: One of the best games I've ever played and has the perfect ending, no need for a third and i love it that way.
Really fun to play with friends (steal the cubes and destroy them)

This is my first time actually playing this game on PC.
Now, while it is a good game, what makes it a GREAT game is the fact that it doesn't have Colin Hanks in any capacity. This is what true gaming is all about.

What can be said about this classic that hasn't been said already? The story is very good and its hard to get lost, even if you haven't played the first one, the portal mechanic is still the most unique game play tool I've seen in recent years, and the game isn't too long that it starts to drag but not too short either. If you haven't tried it yet I highly recommend getting this game. ^^
